headline: AppLovin (APP) Drops as Investor Sentiment Dented by Non-S&P Inclusion
summary: We recently published a list of 10 Stocks Take A Shocking Nosedive. AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) is one of the worst-performing stocks on Thursday. AppLovin declined by 4.46 percent on Wednesday to close at $344.37 apiece as investors unloaded portfolios while waiting for updates on key economic developments. Additionally, sour sentiment lingered following its surprising non-inclusion […]
